item.title: Right-Wing Influencers Have Flooded Minneapolis
item.description: Clips from creators in Minnesota have become primary evidence in attempts by the right wing to justify ICE’s surge on American cities.

item.title: GoFundMe Ignores Own Rules by Hosting a Legal-Defense Fund for the ICE Agent Who Killed Renee Good
item.description: The fundraiser for the ICE agent in the Renee Good killing has stayed online in seeming breach of GoFundMe’s own terms of service, prompting questions...

item.title: MacKenzie Scott Donates $45 Million to the Trevor Project
item.description: Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife has made a donation to the LGBTQ+ advocacy group that the organization calls “transformational.”

item.title: Best Travel Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
